1.title: Reagan's Secret Weapon
1.plot: Vladimir Vetrov was a top KGB spy until he betrayed his country and became a secret agent for the West. Codenamed Â"Farewell,Â" he would become America's single greatest asset in the US-Soviet Spy war.

2.title: Escape from Moscow
2.plot: KGB Colonel turned Double Agent Oleg Gordievsky has spent ten years spying for Britain's secret service, MI6. Now the Soviets are on to him. His only hope for survival is to attempt a daring exfiltration plan.

3.title: Codename: Trigon
3.plot: Martha Peterson is a CIA secret weapon, operating as a woman in the man's world of espionage in Cold War Moscow. TRIGON is a KGB turncoat, ready to hand over top secret intelligence to bring down the Soviet Union from within.

imdb.plot outline: Shadow Ops reveals true tales of high-stakes spy games from agents who risked their lives in global espionage. Interviews with former CIA, FBI, KGB, and MI6 agents take viewers inside spellbinding narratives while fly-on-the-wall recreations and a digest of spy gadgets and tactics transport viewer's right into the action. Produced by one of the few production companies granted permission to film inside the CIA's headquarters, this exclusive series is tense and fascinating.
imdb.title: Shadow OPS
plot: Experience true tales of high-stakes spy games as told by secret agents who risked their lives in global espionage.

Shadow Ops reveals true tales of high-stakes spy games from agents who risked their lives in global espionage. Interviews with former CIA, FBI, KGB, and MI6 agents take viewers inside spellbinding narratives while fly-on-the-wall recreations and a digest of spy gadgets and tactics transport viewer's right into the action. Produced by one of the few production companies granted permission to film inside the CIA's headquarters, this exclusive series is tense and fascinating.
